group_1.narration: Once upon a time, there was a girl.@She was just a normal girl you could meet anywhere.
But one day, a mysterious creature appeared@and offered her a "contract".
In exchange for a wish,@she’d become a Magical Girl@and save the world from evil.
The girl made her wish and was given the power@to transform into a Magical Girl.
And so, with her new magic powers,@she fought against the enemies that tormented@people and brought smiles to everyone!

group_1.textRight: I’ve got this idea for a story, but I’d love to hear@your thoughts about it, Sana!

group_1.textLeft: Um… I think it’s okay, even if it’s pretty@standard…

group_1.textRight: Give me more than that,@I can handle any criticism!

group_1.textLeft: …Well…
The girl would be happy and satisfied…
…if she had her wishes fulfilled.
So there isn’t really a reason to save@the world afterwards…
Does she just enjoy fighting?

group_1.textRight: Well, now that you mention it,@it does look that way…
I don’t want my character to be a Magical Girl@battle junkie…
I’d love to hear Iroha’s and Ui’s thoughts too!

group_1.textLeft: Um…
Maybe she needs to have a reason@to fight…or something?
Like…maybe she doesn’t want to fight…
But she’s willing to do it to protect others?
…That’s it!
Maybe in order to make a contract, you have@to pay a price…or something?

group_1.textRight: I get it now!@Thanks for being so helpful!
Oh, I need to ask your advice about@my story too!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, tell me all about it.

group_1.narration: Sana Futaba, Karin Misono, and Yachiyo Nanami…@This lively boarding house is called@Mikazuki Villa, and Yachiyo is the caretaker.
Ui and I moved here after our parents@were transferred overseas for work.

group_1.textRight: As expected of an ex-celebrity, your words@of wisdom are super helpful!

group_1.textLeft: I hope so…
Hey now… Don’t run in the house. @It’s dangerous…

group_1.textRight: I heard that Kanae is going to be on television!

group_1.textLeft: What?! Kanae is..?!

group_1.textRight: Her street performance got a lot of buzz!@Did you know? She could make it big!

group_1.narration: This woman is the other caretaker,@Yachiyo’s grandmother.
I think that girl, Kanae,@used to stay here at Mikazuki Villa.
She left Mikazuki Villa to pursue her music career,@but I heard that until a few years ago@she was a bit of a delinquent who’d@get into fights around here.
Yachiyo told me that a long time ago @Kanae got injured in a fight,@and her grandmother saved her.
Mikazuki Villa isn’t just a boarding house.@It’s also a shelter for girls who are in trouble.@Yachiyo and her grandmother run it together@and help everyone who comes in.
Sana is one of those girls.@Her family abandoned and ostracized her,@so she ran away after a big fight with them.@Yachiyo’s grandmother took her in and@she’s been living here ever since.
Karin doesn’t actually live here, @but her grandmother is friends with Yachiyo’s@so she visits often to chat and draw manga.
I haven’t heard much about the details,@but apparently Karin’s family also has some issues.

group_1.textLeft: So what should we do? I’m sure you want@to send her something to celebrate.

group_1.textRight: Let’s see…maybe some oranges or rice…@Oh! And some nice meat too!

group_1.textLeft: We need to send more than just food… @*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: They both look so happy for her!

group_1.textLeft: I’ve…never met her, but I’m happy for her, too…
Oh, by the way, aren’t Iroha and Ui starting @at their new school tomorrow?
Yes, that’s right!
But you and Karin both attend different schools…
I’m nervous since I won’t know anybody there…
I was told there was a girl who once stayed here @that also attends my school.
But while I’ve heard about her, I still don’t know @her name…
Do you think we can be friends?

group_1.textRight: It’ll all be a-okay! I’m sure you’ll make @100 friends!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
